title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Israel)
summary: The Israeli Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Hebrew: מִשְׂרַד הַחוּץ‎, translit. Misrad HaHutz; Arabic: وزارة الخارجية الإسرائيلية‎)  is one of the most important ministries in the Israeli government. The ministry's role is to implement Israel's foreign policy, and promote economic, cultural, and scientific relations with other countries.[2]
